tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
    timestamp DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_blocks (block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
block_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
miner_id INT,
block_size INT);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
block_id INT NOT NULL,
sender VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
recipient VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
amount DECIMAL(18,2) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_miners (miner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
miner_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
reward DECIMAL(18,2),
total_blocks_mined INT);
